meanings.sent1: The multipaned window let in a lot of light.
meanings.sent2: She admired the multipaned glass door at the store.
meanings.sent3: The multipaned mirror made her look like she was in a funhouse.
meanings.sent4: The multipaned aquarium created a kaleidoscope of colors.
meanings.sent5: The multipaned skylight transformed the room into a sunlit paradise.

meanings.definition: Consisting of several separate sections or parts.
meanings.sent1: The multipaned bookshelf held all her favorite novels.
meanings.sent2: The multipaned room divider added a touch of elegance to the space.
meanings.sent3: The multipaned puzzle was challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: His multipaned approach to problem-solving involved breaking tasks into smaller steps.
meanings.sent5: The multipaned map displayed different regions with clarity.
